publ: by Shenzhen TCL New Technology Co., Limited
name: TCLHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on tcl ac”
”Alexa, set tcl ac to auto mode”
”Alexa, set tcl ac to twenty degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Before you can connect Alexa Smart Home with your TCL devices, you need to follow these steps:

1. Download the “TCL Home" app from Google Play or App Store.
2. Sign up or sign in with your TCL account.
3. Setup the device with your “TCL Home" app, and make sure you can control it in the app.
4. Open Amazon Alexa app (if you haven't install, go Google Play/Apple store to get it), click Setting Menu at the top left, select Skills & Games. And then search for "TCL Home" action and enable it by signing in with the same ID you used in the “TCL Home" app.
5. After the setup is finished, you can control the device with Alexa Smart Home.

Alexa control for the ambient light control is only available when the air purifier is powered on.

Alexa control for TCL TV is not supported by this skill.
